column4: there's supposed to be a zpasswd.py somewhere that lets you specify a new username / pass
disclaimer being that I've never used zope, I just googled a bit
yes it is
and I found this: http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/ZopeOnUbuntu/view?searchterm=plone
but it doesn't work
what specifically doesn't work?
what.. I just cannot login
yes I gathered that. I'm just trying to figure out what's going wrong :)
I can login to localhost:9673
but not to localhost:9673/manage
manage requires password
i created inituser file in /usr/lib/zope with test and encrypted password
reobooted zope, zopectl and nothing...
I can't help you yet, but I'll install zope here and see how it works. Someone else will probably know the answer before me, though.
oh, what version are you running, btw?
what version of ubuntu do you use?
hehehe version of what ;) ?
no version of Ubuntu, actually. But I'm sure zope will run pretty much the same on Gentoo
aha I was asking because packages for hoary are broken
I was curious about your zope version :)
the current version in Gentoo seems to be 2.7.4
I have zope-2.6.4
in fact it is crazy - ubuntu website is based on zope and plone - and packages are broken
